body.p:
Louisville June 7th 1861
Gov Magoffin
Der Sir

You will be called on to remit a fine against L. B. Hicks son, of one of our most active loyal and true Democrats also one of the best citizens ^we have Col Thos M. Hicks^ his son is quite a youth yet he has the ring of the right matter here he is to be killed off in his boyhood by imposing fines on him, by a party who is so notorious in this & other cities that it is scarsely necessary to say more then to refer to the past_
I hope you may find it agreeable to your feeling & Judgment to remit all such fines and in my opinion it will meet the hearty approval of all who know Col Hicks & his worthy son --

Yours with profound respect
S. S. English

Louisville City Ct
$50. } Concealed Weapons
S. B. Hicks
